name: Winnie
body:
winnie
======


winnie is an IRC bot. She sits and waits for people to make statements, "this car is fast," "you are a fatass," "I have a rash."

She will then spit out these statements in conversation later whenever appropriate.

There is a markov functionality as well for increased amusement.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
